settings.title: Marketplace Settings
settings.albumArtBasedColors: Change colours based on album art
settings.albumArtBasedColorsVibrancyToolTip:
Desaturated: The colour that is the most prominent but with much less brightness 
 Light Vibrant: The most Vibrant colour but with the brightness amped up a tad 
 Prominent: The colour that pops the most in the album art 
 Vibrant: The most vibrant colour in the album art
settings.almbumArtColorsModeToolTip:
Monochrome Dark: A colour scheme based directly on the main colour selected, using different shades of the main colour and mixing in greys to create a colour scheme, this is the inverse of Monochrome Light. 
 Monochrome Light: A colour scheme based directly on the main colour selected, using different shades of the main colour and mixing in greys to create a colour scheme. The background of monochrome light would be the foreground or text colour on Monochrome Dark and vice versa. 
 Analogic: A colour scheme based on the main colour selected, using the colours adjacent to the main colour on the colour wheel. 
 Analogic Complementary: A colour scheme based on the main colour selected, using the colours adjacent to the main colour on the colour wheel and the complementary colour. 
 Triad: A colour scheme based on the main colour selected, using the colours on the colour wheel that are equidistant from the main colour. 
 Quad: A colour scheme based on the main colour selected, using the colours on the colour wheel that are 90 degrees from the main colour.
settings.resetDescription: Uninstall all extensions and themes, and reset preferences
settings.backupLabel: Back up or restore all Marketplace data. This does not include settings for anything installed via Marketplace.

snippets.customCSSPlaceholder: Input your own custom CSS here! You can find them in the installed tab for management.
snippets.snippetNamePlaceholder: Enter a name for your custom snippet
snippets.snippetDescPlaceholder: Enter a description for your custom snippet

reloadModal.description: A page reload is required to complete this operation.

updateModal.description: Update Spicetify Marketplace to receive new features and bug fixes.
